Description:
Facilitates implementation of new training, development, recruiting, and other related initiatives.
Uses critical thinking skills to analyze HR metrics and data from various sources and identify patterns related to employee engagement, turnover, and compliance.
Formulates feasible short- and long-term goals, milestones, and benchmarks for performance metrics based on data insights and presents recommendations to management.
Gather HR data from different sources, such as HRIS, payroll, surveys, and government labor statistics, and compile them into a comprehensive report.Skills
Skills:
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Takes a results-oriented approach to problem-solving, identifying and addressing root causes to achieve success.
Clear and concise communicator with strong writing and speaking skills.
